title: Salmon with green butter
description: A simple way of serving salmon, topped with a slice of delicious herb butter. Serve with boiled new potatoes and a green salad.
ingredients: large handful fresh sorrel leaves (if you can't get sorrel you can use extra parsley and chives or tarragon or basil and add a squeeze or two of lemon juice)
4 portions salmon fillet, skin-on, about 170g/6oz each
salt and freshly ground black pepper
a few sprigs of parsley and lengths of chive
